svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2022-03-08T02:41:49.493Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/15.2.7 Chrome/93.0.4577.63 Electron/14.0.1 Safari/537.36" etag="UaQYuCUEkccq-QYOUkK2" version="15.2.7" type="device"><diagram id="J4OgnDsjWe4Z_stiub_J" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 151px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 290px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
任務一
輸入檔名並開啟檔案

switch.text: 任務一 輸入檔名並開啟檔案

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 232px; height: 1px; padding-top: 37px; margin-left: 8px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
data
學校資料陣列
heap
以heap形式儲存學校資料的類別
heap[x]
用來儲存data上資料相對index的陣列
data[x] > data[y]
若資料x的學生數比資料y的學生數還要多
data[x] < data[y]
若資料x的學生數比資料y的學生數還要少
leftmostbit(x)
x的最左位元值 (ex. leftmostbit(11)=8)
l
紀錄heap裡的最末點位置、新加點位置
預設data[0]的學生數為2147483647
且data[1]為第一筆資料、heap[1]為根

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 97px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 317px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
如果檔案中有
資料尚未讀入

switch.text: 如果檔案中有 資料尚未讀入

heap.push_back(i)
將heap陣列往後放入 i

印出根: heap[1]
底: heap[l]
最左: heap[leftmostbit(l)]
